data.job_description:
Overview

At Genesis, we put our customers and employees first. We are the national leader in non-Prime credit cards serving millions of customers who are underserved by others in the industry. We are fair and transparent in all interactions.

We’re entrepreneurial and we look for people who want to make an impact. We hire people, not just positions.

We’re an established company with over 20 years of experience, but now we’re taking things to the next level. We are looking for someone that wants to make an impact—someone who wants to influence the business and play a pivotal role in leading the charge for change.

Join the nation’s leader in second-look finance servicing as our Lead React Native Developer!

What’s In It For You:
• Making an impact
• Being an integral part of a team that is critical to our business success
• An entrepreneurial culture in a growth business

The impact you’ll have at Genesis:

Genesis is seeking a talented Lead React Native Developer to help deliver company’s first Mobile Application that provides world class experience to delight our customers. An ideal candidate is a forward and innovative thinker, experienced in working on applications that are used by millions of customers with great satisfaction. Customer empathy and working collaboratively in cross-functional teams is a must. The ability to thrive within our Agile framework combined with a commitment to continuous improvement is essential. Our engineers are delivery focused with experience in React Native, and other mobile development platforms including – iOS OR Android, React, .Net, C#, SQL and Azure Cloud who can identify and articulate different solutions and approaches when building customer applications. Practical real-world experience building quality robust scalable solutions on Mobile, Web with integration to Backend Services coupled with the ability to share and learn from your teammates is key to success.

Responsibilities

As our Lead React Native Developer you will:
• Deliver best in-class mobile applications with high-quality, efficiency, scalable, and reusable code always protecting customer privacy and confidentiality.
• Bring mobile best practices from previous experiences as well as being a constant learner who keeps up with what is happening on Mobile Development.
• Deliver well-structured software with robust unit tests.
• Be responsible for the quality of the code delivered for our code as well as the team’s.
• Be a leader is figuring issues proactively (functional and non-functional) and partnering well with team, Product Owner, and Quality Assurance team.
• Be an active team member partnering within the Scrum team to deliver their as well as teams tasks on schedule.
• Extend existing system functionality based on user requirements; analyzing code to identify areas for modification while maintaining and supporting existing products.
• Provide feedback on Mobile strategy.
• Actively participate in the definition, design, and planning new and updated features.
• Partner with teammates to ensure cohesive, usable, quality solutions are produced.
• Produce complete, succinct, and coherent documentation.

These duties must be performed with or without reasonable accommodation.

Qualifications

Requirements:
• 8+ years of experience in all aspects of the application development process; including Epic/Story elaboration, technical design, coding, deployment, and documentation.
• 6+ years of development experience delivering mobile applications on React Native, Native iOS (Swift or Objective C), Native Android (Java or Kotlin).
• Familiar with all things related to React Native including the latest libraries – Typescript, Storybook, Redux, Redux Persist, AsyncLocalStorage, React Native Animated API, Axios, React Query. Frameworks like Jest, husky, jetifier, eslint. Experience with Analytics, Crashlytics, Push Notifications etc.
• Familiar with building tools such Xcode, Android Studio.
• 2+ years of development experience delivering Web Applications built in React or similar frameworks with experience integrating with RESTful APIs.
• 2+ years of experience utilizing the following technologies: C#, .NET Core, SQL Server.
• Experience integrating with Google/Firebase Analytics, Crash Analysis Tools and Performance Monitoring and various tools in React Native Platform. Deploying to App Store and Play Store is expected!
• Debugging and testing: Proficiency in debugging and testing React Native applications, including tools like Jest, React testing Library and Enzyme.
• JavaScript/ TypeScript proficiency: Expertise in JavaScript and TypeScript including advanced knowledge if ES6+, functional programming, and asynchronous programming.
• Professional experience with CI/CD Pipeline systems like ADO, Jenkins, Terraform, and SonarQube is expected.
• 4-year degree in computer related field or equivalent experience in computer systems desired.

What’s In It For You:
• Health insurance including individual and family Medical, Dental and Vision insurance
• Relax and recharge with Paid Time Off (PTO) Program; plus 6 paid holidays and 3 paid floating holidays
• Financial health with 401k plus employer match up to 4%
• Take care of your well-being through Wellness perks
• We invest in your future through Tuition Reimbursement and ongoing Learning & Development
• Save on taxes with Flexible Spending Accounts
• Peace of mind with Life and AD&D Insurance
• Protect yourself with company paid Long-Term Disability

Genesis understands experience comes in many forms, many skills are transferable, if your experience is this close to what we’re looking for, consider applying. We know that diversity of thought has made us the entrepreneurial and innovative company that we are today.

Genesis Financial Solutions provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

Qualifications: Customer empathy and working collaboratively in cross-functional teams is a must
The ability to thrive within our Agile framework combined with a commitment to continuous improvement is essential

Our engineers are delivery focused with experience in React Native, and other mobile development platforms including – iOS OR Android, React, .Net, C#, SQL and Azure Cloud who can identify and articulate different solutions and approaches when building customer applications

Practical real-world experience building quality robust scalable solutions on Mobile, Web with integration to Backend Services coupled with the ability to share and learn from your teammates is key to success
8+ years of experience in all aspects of the application development process; including Epic/Story elaboration, technical design, coding, deployment, and documentation
6+ years of development experience delivering mobile applications on React Native, Native iOS (Swift or Objective C), Native Android (Java or Kotlin)
Familiar with all things related to React Native including the latest libraries – Typescript, Storybook, Redux, Redux Persist, AsyncLocalStorage, React Native Animated API, Axios, React Query
Frameworks like Jest, husky, jetifier, eslint
Experience with Analytics, Crashlytics, Push Notifications etc
Familiar with building tools such Xcode, Android Studio
2+ years of development experience delivering Web Applications built in React or similar frameworks with experience integrating with RESTful APIs
2+ years of experience utilizing the following technologies: C#, .NET Core, SQL Server
Experience integrating with Google/Firebase Analytics, Crash Analysis Tools and Performance Monitoring and various tools in React Native Platform
Debugging and testing: Proficiency in debugging and testing React Native applications, including tools like Jest, React testing Library and Enzyme
JavaScript/ TypeScript proficiency: Expertise in JavaScript and TypeScript including advanced knowledge if ES6+, functional programming, and asynchronous programming
Professional experience with CI/CD Pipeline systems like ADO, Jenkins, Terraform, and SonarQube is expected
Responsibilities: Deliver well-structured software with robust unit tests
Be responsible for the quality of the code delivered for our code as well as the team’s
Be a leader is figuring issues proactively (functional and non-functional) and partnering well with team, Product Owner, and Quality Assurance team
Be an active team member partnering within the Scrum team to deliver their as well as teams tasks on schedule
Extend existing system functionality based on user requirements; analyzing code to identify areas for modification while maintaining and supporting existing products
Provide feedback on Mobile strategy
Actively participate in the definition, design, and planning new and updated features
Partner with teammates to ensure cohesive, usable, quality solutions are produced
Produce complete, succinct, and coherent documentation
These duties must be performed with or without reasonable accommodation
Benefits: Health insurance including individual and family Medical, Dental and Vision insurance
Relax and recharge with Paid Time Off (PTO) Program; plus 6 paid holidays and 3 paid floating holidays
Financial health with 401k plus employer match up to 4%
Take care of your well-being through Wellness perks
We invest in your future through Tuition Reimbursement and ongoing Learning & Development
Save on taxes with Flexible Spending Accounts

data.job_description:
Role: React-Native Developer

Duration: 12 Months

Location: Austin TX

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with a team of developers and designers to create a web application run on multiple platforms

Create reusable, effective, and scalable JavaScript code

Design the data and presentation layer of the web applications front-end

Use additional JavaScript libraries such as Redux to manage the web applications state, derive computed data from the state of the system, and make asynchronous API calls

Translate the clients technical requirements into code

Test and update web application so that it can be used on all web browsers

Skills and Qualifications:

Professional experience in Native React

Highly proficient in rendering components with Native APIs

Highly proficient in JavaScript, modern JavaScript, HTML,

Highly proficient in one or more libraries (e.g. Redux, React Router, etc) for state managing and routing in addition to React.

Proficient in using Git as a control system

Qualifications: Professional experience in Native React
Highly proficient in rendering components with Native APIs
Highly proficient in JavaScript, modern JavaScript, HTML,
Highly proficient in one or more libraries (e.g. Redux, React Router, etc) for state managing and routing in addition to React
Proficient in using Git as a control system
Responsibilities: Collaborate with a team of developers and designers to create a web application run on multiple platforms
Create reusable, effective, and scalable JavaScript code
Design the data and presentation layer of the web applications front-end
Use additional JavaScript libraries such as Redux to manage the web applications state, derive computed data from the state of the system, and make asynchronous API calls
Translate the clients technical requirements into code
Test and update web application so that it can be used on all web browsers

data.job_description:
Tekfortune is a fast-growing consulting firm specialized in permanent, contract & project-based staffing services for worlds leading organizations in a broad range of industries. In this quickly changing economic landscape, virtual recruiting and remote work are critical for the future of work. To support the active project demands and skills gaps, our staffing experts can help you find the best job for you.

Role: React/React Native Developer

Location: Remote

Duration: 6 Months Contract to Hire

Required Skills: REACT/REACT NATIVE/AEM

Project Overview
• Currently undergoing a core modernization of patient space. This team is responsible for the Patient Portal (where patients go to access their data). This is access on the web and mobile (Android & iOS).
• Replatforming effort is focused on moving core systems to Google Cloud, React/ReactNative, GraphQL and Adobe Experience Manager (AEM).

Tech Stack
• Should have 5+ years experience
• React ( web) / React Native (mobile)
• GraphQL
• Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)
Bonus:
• .NET services (specifically .NET core)
• Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

For more information and other jobs available please contact our recruitment team at careers@tekfortune.com . To view all the jobs available in the USA and Asia please visit our website at https://www.tekfortune.com/careers/ .

Qualifications: Should have 5+ years experience
React ( web) / React Native (mobile)
Responsibilities: Currently undergoing a core modernization of patient space

data.job_description:
Role: Senior React Native Developer

Location: San Francisco, CA

Mode- Contract W2

Job Description
• React Native Experience - Minimum 2yrs - Must Have
• Experience in React-Native-Cli, Redux, Middleware - Must Have
• Worked in Atleast 1 project on React Native - Must Have
• Experience in JavaScript ES6, ReactNative Stylesheet - Must Have
• Experience in Native app development (Android/iOS) - Good to Have
• Experience in iOS and Android App store releases - Good to Have
• Knowledge in React Native Debugging tools Must have
• Knowledge in handling React Native performance issues Must have

Candidate should
• Have good expertise building Mobile applications using React Native
• Work with Scrum Masters/Product Owners to understand the business needs
• Should be able to design the UI of the mobile applications using wireframes and mocks
• Should be able to call out risks or ask for immediate help when information is inadequate or if stuck
• Should work with Backend developers, integration engineers and QA folks on regular basis to ensure the designs are integrated and tested.
• Should be able to deploy apps in respective app stores (if needed)
• Should participate in all Scrum ceremonies and provide valuable feedback for optimizing delivery and process improvements.

Diverse Lynx LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive due consideration for employment without any discrimination. All applicants will be evaluated solely on the basis of their ability, competence and their proven capability to perform the functions outlined in the corresponding role. We promote and support a diverse workforce across all levels in the company.

Qualifications: React Native Experience - Minimum 2yrs - Must Have
Experience in React-Native-Cli, Redux, Middleware - Must Have
Worked in Atleast 1 project on React Native - Must Have
Experience in JavaScript ES6, ReactNative Stylesheet - Must Have
Experience in Native app development (Android/iOS) - Good to Have
Experience in iOS and Android App store releases - Good to Have
Knowledge in React Native Debugging tools Must have
Knowledge in handling React Native performance issues Must have
Have good expertise building Mobile applications using React Native
Work with Scrum Masters/Product Owners to understand the business needs
Should work with Backend developers, integration engineers and QA folks on regular basis to ensure the designs are integrated and tested
Should be able to deploy apps in respective app stores (if needed)
Should participate in all Scrum ceremonies and provide valuable feedback for optimizing delivery and process improvements

TITLE: React Native developer

LOCATION- Minneapolis, MN and Chicago, IL (Day1 onsite)

DURATION: Fulltime

Job Description

Desired Competencies (Technical/Behavioral Competency)

Must-Have " Design and develop user interface components for JavaScript-based online and mobile apps using React Native

" Build pixel-perfect smooth UIs across mobile platforms and leverage native APIs for deep integrations across platforms.

" Experience working with applications using React and having knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML and front-end development.

" Make use of additional JavaScript libraries such as Redux to make asynchronous API calls as well as improve the performance of the websites/mobile apps

" Excellent all-round programming skills (7+ Year)

" Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.

" Reach out to the open-source community to encourage and help implement critical software fixesReact Native moves fast and often breaks things.

" Write reusable, effective, and scalable code and create interchangeable front-end modules.

" Understand clients needs to build apps in stipulated time/budget.

" Write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.

Good-to-Have " Knowledge of Azure DevOps (ADO) CI/CD pipeline

" Experience with automated testing suites, like Jest or Mocha

" Exposure of Azure Environment and Application Containerization

" SVN, Jenkins, GIT

" Agile Methodology

" Team Management

Diverse Lynx LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive due consideration for employment without any discrimination. All applicants will be evaluated solely on the basis of their ability, competence and their proven capability to perform the functions outlined in the corresponding role. We promote and support a diverse workforce across all levels in the company.

Qualifications: Must-Have " Design and develop user interface components for JavaScript-based online and mobile apps using React Native
" Experience working with applications using React and having knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML and front-end development
" Excellent all-round programming skills (7+ Year)
Good-to-Have " Knowledge of Azure DevOps (ADO) CI/CD pipeline
" Experience with automated testing suites, like Jest or Mocha
" Exposure of Azure Environment and Application Containerization
" SVN, Jenkins, GIT
Responsibilities: " Make use of additional JavaScript libraries such as Redux to make asynchronous API calls as well as improve the performance of the websites/mobile apps
" Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native
" Reach out to the open-source community to encourage and help implement critical software fixes
React Native moves fast and often breaks things
" Write reusable, effective, and scalable code and create interchangeable front-end modules
" Understand clients needs to build apps in stipulated time/budget
" Write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality

data.job_description:
Hi,

Hope you are doing good

This is Santhosh from Info way Solutions; We have an opening for a React Native Developer at Dallas, TX & Bentonville, AR location and the detailed Job description is given below

Job Title: React Native Developer

Term: 12+ months

Direct Client

Location: Dallas, TX & Bentonville, AR(Remote until covid)

Mandatory Skill : Need strong experience in React native

Responsibilities

Developing new user experiences using React.js

Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use

Managing complexity in the face of a sophisticated set of business requirements

Ensuring that code is well-tested and in line with best practices

Skills

Proficiency in JavaScript and browser APIs

Strong grasp of React fundamentals

Experience with unit and integration testing React codebases. Experience with RTL, Jest and testCafe is a plus

Familiarity with integrating React UIs with backend APIs; experience

Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements

Thanks & Regards.

Santhosh Kumaran | Infowaygroup.com | US IT Recruiter

Santhosh@infowaygroup.com

Cell: (925)-230-9484

Info Way Solutions LLC | 46520 Fremont Blvd, Suite 614 | Fremont, CA –94538. linkedin.com/in/santhosh-kumaran-n-097142227

Qualifications: Mandatory Skill : Need strong experience in React native
Proficiency in JavaScript and browser APIs
Strong grasp of React fundamentals
Experience with unit and integration testing React codebases
Familiarity with integrating React UIs with backend APIs; experience
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
Responsibilities: Developing new user experiences using React.js
Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
Managing complexity in the face of a sophisticated set of business requirements
